trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSWKSMECHAENTRYTICKETCOUNTER_00932_EXCHANGE_CONFIRM<tab>It'll cost you <var 22 E803 ((,)) /var> <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8020302 /var> for a pilot application. What'll it be?

TEXT_CTSWKSMECHAENTRYTICKETCOUNTER_00932_NOT_ENOUGH_POINT<tab>Sorry, but I'm gonna need <var 22 E803 ((,)) /var> <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8020302 /var> from you before I can get you a pilot application. Best of luck out there!
TEXT_CTSWKSMECHAENTRYTICKETCOUNTER_00932_FIRST_TALK<tab>I manage the mechs and issue pilot applications to initiative collaborators. What do you need?

TEXT_CTSWKSMECHAENTRYTICKETCOUNTER_00932_TICKET_GET<tab>Here you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Submit this application at the start of a mech op, and if you're lucky, you'll be selected for deployment!

TEXT_CTSWKSMECHAENTRYTICKETCOUNTER_00932_TICKET_GETED<tab>You already have a pilot application, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! If you're ready to submit it, you can do so through your exotablet at the start of a mech op directive.
TEXT_CTSWKSMECHAENTRYTICKETCOUNTER_00932_TICKET_QUESTION<tab>Request a pilot application?
TEXT_CTSWKSMECHAENTRYTICKETCOUNTER_00932_TALK_QUESTION<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_CTSWKSMECHAENTRYTICKETCOUNTER_00932_TALK_CHOICES1<tab>Request a pilot application.
TEXT_CTSWKSMECHAENTRYTICKETCOUNTER_00932_TALK_CHOICES2<tab>Travel to the ground support zone.
TEXT_CTSWKSMECHAENTRYTICKETCOUNTER_00932_TALK_CHOICES3<tab>Learn about ground support.
TEXT_CTSWKSMECHAENTRYTICKETCOUNTER_00932_TALK_CHOICES4<tab>Nothing.

TEXT_CTSWKSMECHAENTRYTICKETCOUNTER_00932_TALK_SUPPORTER1<tab>Ground supporters aid areas where mechs are deployed. You'll use specialized portable equipment to handle problems ill-suited to massive machinery.

TEXT_CTSWKSMECHAENTRYTICKETCOUNTER_00932_TALK_SUPPORTER2<tab>Don't forget, any materials gathered from the operation are to be submitted to the field scanner. Walk up to one, and it'll handle the rest.
TEXT_CTSWKSMECHAENTRYTICKETCOUNTER_00932_WARP_TALK1<tab>This is not a drill─a mech op is underway! If you'd like to offer ground support, I'll send you at once!
TEXT_CTSWKSMECHAENTRYTICKETCOUNTER_00932_QUESTION<tab>Travel to the ground support zone?
TEXT_CTSWKSMECHAENTRYTICKETCOUNTER_00932_WARP_TALK2<tab>Eager, are we? Whenever the next mech op directive is issued, I'll be happy to send you.
TEXT_CTSWKSMECHAENTRYTICKETCOUNTER_00932_BEFORE_QUEST_TALK<tab>New here, I take it? Have you spoken with Searchingway yet?
TEXT_CTSWKSMECHAENTRYTICKETCOUNTER_00932_TALK_CHOICES5<tab>Learn about application types.
TEXT_CTSWKSMECHAENTRYTICKETCOUNTER_00932_TICKET_KINDS_TALK1<tab>Before I issue a pilot application, I'll ask you to specify your desired operation site.
TEXT_CTSWKSMECHAENTRYTICKETCOUNTER_00932_TICKET_KINDS_TALK2<tab>You'll need to pay using the local currency, too, so make sure you come prepared!
TEXT_CTSWKSMECHAENTRYTICKETCOUNTER_00932_BEFORE_QUEST_TALK_C1W2<tab>Welcome to Phaenna! Have you spoken with Searchingway yet?
